metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37575 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple use-after-free vulnerabilities exist in the VCD get_vartokenrealloc functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vcd file canlead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a maliciousfile to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns theuse-after-free when triggered via the GUI's interactive VCD parsing code.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
